trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an ongoing operation is aborted by the user.
trans-unit.target: Denne unntak n책r en p책g책ende operasjon ble avbrutt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: This exception indicates that an operation has been aborted by the consumer of an API.
trans-unit.target: Dette unntaket angir at en operasjonen ble avbrutt av forbrukeren av en API.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the event handler of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.SqlRowsCopied> event sets the **Abort** property to `true` in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs> object passed to the handler, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> method stops sending rows to the server and throws an OperationAbortedException.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis hendelsesbehandlingen for den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.SqlRowsCopied>hendelsen angir den **avbrudd** egenskapen `true` i den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs>objektet som er sendt til et behandlingsprogram den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>metoden stopper sending rader til serveren og oppst책r en OperationAbortedException.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.SqlRowsCopied>
